subject: ROPAD Study: Genetics Screening Report
body:
Dear Clinical Team,

Attached is the genetics screening batch report (GDX-ROP-23-08) for the ROPAD study, containing results for 5 participants.

This is an automated notification. Please do not reply to this email.

Thank you,
Genoma Diagnostics Laboratory

subject: Fwd: ROPAD Study: Genetics Screening Report
body:
Hi Alex,

Please see the attached batch report from Genoma Diagnostics.

The results indicate two mutation-positive participants (ROP-001-1034 and ROP-002-2011) who are potential candidates for the BIIB122/DNL151 (LIGHTHOUSE) study.

Participant ROP-002-2011 is located in a country where LIGHTHOUSE is not yet recruiting. Could you please advise on how we should proceed for this individual?

Best regards,

Ben Carter
Clinical Research Associate
Synergy Clinical Research
